      • CSVBaseHelper

        public CSVBaseHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • readAll

        protected List<String[]> readAll(BufferedReader reader,
                                 int skip)
        Reads CSV file to a String[] list
        Parameters:
        reader - The BufferedReader object instance to the CSV File. Retrieve with FileIOHelper.getFileBufferedReader(String)
        skip - How many lines in the file to skip (set 1 for header)
        Returns:
        A list of string arrays containing all the CSV values

      • writeToCsvFile

        protected void writeToCsvFile(List<String[]> writeStrings,
                              BufferedWriter writer)
        Writes a list of String Arrays to a CSV file Note: This will overwrite the file
        Parameters:
        writeStrings - List of String arrays to write to
        writer - The BufferedWriter object instance to the CSV file. Retrieve with FileIOHelper.getFileBufferedWriter(String)
